item.title: Building my custom Oak Hangboard
item.author: Author
item.description: For those who share a passion for climbing, a personalized hangboard is more than a training tool; I took on the challenge of creating a custom hangboard from the ground up, and here’s how I turned oak wood leftovers into my dream hangboard and also a present for a friend. Choosing the Right Wood and Finger Pocket Layout The journey began with selecting the perfect wood. I sourced oak hardwood leftovers from a nearby sawmill, known for its strength and durabilityâ€”essential qualities for a hangboard even when undergoing high intensity training sessions.
